page.title: 15ABINGDON'S LOCAL NEWS(1)
page.content: Re-written extracts from local newspapers published week ending 15th June,1985. JOBS FEAR AS GARAGE IS CLOSED DOWN A company that runs a local Abingdon garage is forced to close because of trading difficulties.But the twenty three employees that work at the garage in the Vineyard are hoping that they will not lose their jobs. TENNIS IN ABINGDON Abingdon Lawn Tennis Club is in the middle of it's annual club tournament at Albert Park.Finals day is scheduled for June 30th.The club holds it's mixed American Tournament for the Preston Bowl on July 21st. IN THE CHAIR MAYOR Abingdon has a new mayor,it's second in under a month.But a councillor has not hung up their chain already.(continued on page 16)
